data.fullContent: When I was a kid, there was an advertisement for an amusement park with an annoying song. The song would get stuck in your head really easily. And the commercial was very short, so just this small piece of the song would play over and over again. To this day, I think of the theme park when I hear the song.
data.answer: 当我还是个孩子的时候，有一个游乐园的广告，里面有一首烦人的歌。这首歌很容易在你脑海里留下印象。广告很短，所以这首歌的一小段就会一遍又一遍地播放。直到今天，每当我听到这首歌，我都会想起主题公园。
